code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/Search.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const searchCategories=[{id:'routes',name:'Routen',icon:'üó∫Ô∏è'},{id:'places',name:'Orte',icon:'üìç'},{id:'community',name:'Community',icon:'üë•'}];function Search(){const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');const[activeCategory,setActiveCategory]=useState('routes');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Suchen Sie nach Routen, Orten oder Beitr\xE4gen...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value),autoFocus:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-categories",children:searchCategories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:`category-button ${activeCategory===category.id?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>setActiveCategory(category.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:category.icon}),category.name]},category.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-results",children:!searchTerm?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-search fa-3x"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Geben Sie einen Suchbegriff ein, um loszulegen"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"results-list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Suchergebnisse f\xFCr \"",searchTerm,"\" in ",searchCategories.find(cat=>cat.id===activeCategory).name]})})})]});}export default Search;
